headline: Should Bloom Energy's (BE) Upcoming Earnings Reveal a Turning Point for Clean Power Leadership?
summary: Earlier this week, Bloom Energy announced it will report its third quarter 2025 financial results on October 28, 2025, and host a management webcast discussing ongoing progress in clean power solutions for large clients such as Oracle and American Electric Power. Bloom Energy is positioned as a key provider for data centers and industries seeking resilient, onsite energy as AI-driven demand reshapes the market for distributed clean power systems. We'll explore how analyst optimism about...

headline: China's lesson for the US: it takes more than chips to win the AI race
summary: Wu, however, immediately outlined a clear road map for Alibaba's AI development, with a goal towards so-called artificial superintelligence (ASI) - when the firm's Qwen open-source models and cloud services would serve as the software and computing infrastructure of the future. In essence, Alibaba aimed to become the "world's leading full-stack AI service provider", he said. Alibaba owns the Post. headline: Fastly (FSLY) Is Down 6.8% After Cloud Margin Weakness Triggers Tech Sector Reassessment
summary: In the past week, technology-related stocks including Fastly saw declines amid renewed concerns over artificial intelligence demand, profit margins, and heightened economic uncertainty driven by the ongoing U.S. government shutdown. Sector-wide caution intensified after cloud margin disappointments at Oracle, weighing on sentiment for cloud and edge firms like Fastly ahead of its upcoming earnings release. We'll consider how broad concerns over technology sector profitability and...
